function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Open plan apartments and removable partitions may facilitate the spread of contagious diseases within the building.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conversion of spaces for gathering and social interaction may lead to overcrowding and increased risk of disease transmission, especially during a pandemic.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High population density in urban areas increases the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementation of urban agriculture may increase the risk of foodborne illnesses if proper hygiene and sanitation practices are not followed.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of specific measures for contagious disease propagation in residential buildings","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent information disclosure about the pandemic","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Emphasis on strategic planning processes and the need for strategic alignment may overlook the specific measures needed to mitigate contagious diseases in the built environment.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid and global spread of a contagious epidemic","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Neglect of public health in strategic planning","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of disease propagation through collaborative strategies and citizen engagement","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 through droplets released from coughs and exhales","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risky working conditions in construction sites","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of communication and information on safety rules and laws","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited discussion on the perception of workers in the pandemic and the effectiveness of safety measures","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 in labor-intensive construction industry.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Safety concerns regarding virus spread in workplaces","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of covid-19 through construction industry complaints.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complaints filed online and via email may spread contagious diseases due to shared contact surfaces, such as keyboards and touchscreens.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"In-person complaints pose a risk of disease transmission through close contact and shared physical spaces.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proliferation of contagious diseases due to improper cleaning and sanitation processes.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Personnel reporting to work after testing positive for the virus","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Employers not enforcing social distancing","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Employers not providing necessary ppe and hygiene facilities","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Construction labor developing health and safety concerns during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of health and safety guidelines","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient communication and awareness about health and safety guidelines","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor workplace hygiene and sanitation","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to health and safety guidelines","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor communication and awareness about the virus","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of covid-19 awareness among employees","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misinformation about covid-19","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of social distancing and hygiene measures within the workplace","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of differentiation in safety measures for vaccinated and unvaccinated employees","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate response plan for high-level exposure risk tasks and environments","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible virus exposure in the workplace due to infected employees.","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate hygiene and sanitization practices in the workplace.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contact surfaces such as tables, chairs, doorknobs, handrails, and buttons can act as vectors for contagious diseases due to frequent touching.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Virus can stay on surfaces for days, posing a risk of transmission through contaminated materials and equipment.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of paper in the delivery process may pose a risk of virus transmission, especially if electronic signatures and receipts are not an option.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to the virus at work","category":"Workplace safety and occupational implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in built environments","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor sanitation and hygiene practices","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global spread of contagious diseases through tourism","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Health-related risks influence choice of destination and tourism education","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The occurrence of the covid-19 pandemic has led to general fear.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"}]}
